name: APC | AOS | Security | Authentication | Login (SYSLOG)
description: System: Console user 'admin' logged in from 192.168.220.54. 0x0014

patterns.value_re: System: Console user '(?P<user>.+?)' logged in from (?P<ip>\S+). 0x0014

name: APC | AOS | Security | Authentication | Logout #1 (SYSLOG)
description: System: Console user 'admin' logged out from 192.168.220.54. 0x001E

patterns.value_re: System: Console user '(?P<user>.+?)' logged out from (?P<ip>\S+). 0x001E
